news.title: Partial victory for nurse in NHS trans changing room row
news.summary: A tribunal said NHS Fife harassed Sandie Peggie but dismissed other claims she made against the health board and a transgender doctor.

news.title: European leaders walk tightrope between backing Ukraine and keeping US on board
news.summary: Europe's leaders are trying to avoid alienating Donald Trump while fighting for Ukrainian sovereignty and future continental stability.

news.title: Paramount launches rival bid for Warner Bros Discovery
news.summary: The Hollywood battle to buy Warner Bros Discovery is shaping up to be a blockbuster.

news.title: Prince Harry's security in UK under review
news.summary: It comes after he lost a legal case to have his police protection reinstated when visiting the UK.

news.title: Leonardo DiCaprio's One Battle After Another leads Golden Globe nominations
news.summary: Hamnet and Sinners are also recognised, with Timothee Chalamet and Cynthia Erivo up for acting prizes.

news.title: Two more arrested after suspected Heathrow pepper spray attack
news.summary: A three-year-old girl was among 21 people injured during the incident at the west London airport.

news.title: Lando Norris on family sacrifices and proving himself wrong after winning F1 world title
news.summary: Lando Norris reflects on family sacrifices, proving himself wrong and how a lap in Monaco made him cry and "flipped everything".

news.title: Joey Barton given suspended jail sentence over 'grossly offensive' social media posts
news.summary: The ex-footballer sent "grossly offensive" posts about Jeremy Vine, Lucy Ward and Eni Aluko, a court hears.

news.title: Major earthquake strikes Japan's north-east coast
news.summary: The magnitude 7.6 tremor prompts orders to evacuate residents.

news.title: Storm Bram named with amber weather warnings for damaging winds and heavy rain
news.summary: Damaging winds and flooding rain will sweep across the UK on Tuesday with Storm Bram as Simon King explains
